data.title: Law and Social Justice Certificate LibGuide
data.meta_description: This guide provides a selection of resources for the Law and Social Justice Certificate.
data.text:
You can access these or any other of the Library's databases from the Library Page on the Marianopolis Website or through our A-Z list of databases.

Logging in

To log in to any of the Library's databases, please follow these step-by-step instructions.

All of the films in this column are available for 2-hour loans at the Library. To borrow these films, please go to the Circulation Desk on the Main Floor and ask for the film.
